name: zot24-claude-code-plugins
description: A collection of Claude Code plugins for various development workflows

plugins.name: umbrel-app
plugins.description: Expert assistant for developing, packaging, testing, and submitting apps for umbrelOS

plugins.name: claude-code-expert
plugins.description: Comprehensive Claude Code and Anthropic ecosystem knowledge. Official patterns for agents, skills, hooks, commands, and MCP.

plugins.name: clawdbot
plugins.description: Expert on Clawdbot - AI assistant framework connecting Claude/LLMs to messaging platforms (WhatsApp, Telegram, Discord, Slack, Signal, iMessage, Teams)

plugins.name: agent-browser
plugins.description: Expert on agent-browser - Vercel's headless browser automation CLI for AI agents with 50+ commands, snapshots, and multi-session support

plugins.name: chat-sdk
plugins.description: Expert on Chat SDK - Vercel's open-source template for building production-ready AI chatbots with generative UI, artifacts, and multi-provider support

plugins.name: ai-sdk
plugins.description: Expert on AI SDK - Vercel's TypeScript toolkit for building AI applications with unified LLM API, streaming, tool calling, and agents

plugins.name: agent-skills
plugins.description: Expert at the Agent Skills open format for extending AI agent capabilities - create, validate, and understand SKILL.md files
